customValues.title: On Stackoverflow

pages.title: About
pages.body: Hello, I am Sarfraz Ahmed, a self-taught programmer from Karachi, Pakistan mainly involved in PHP, MySQL, HTML/CSS, JavaScript/jQuery for around 6+ years now. I also have bit of experience with Android platform. I am also Pakistan's top user on StackOverflow by reputation holding Gold badge for the tags PHP, Javascript, jQuery, HTML and CSS.

pages.title: Projects
pages.body:
PHP (Personal)

  • BloggerCMS: A CMS that helps you create static blogs via Admin Panel.
  • EZPHP: Light-weight PHP Framework with MVC Design Pattern.
  • PHP-Execute: PHP Code Runner!
  • Good Todo: Keep track of your tasks and todos
  • Save Page Complete: Class to save pages in single file with all CSS and JavaScript

PHP (Professional)

  • Donors Impact: A donation giving website for the universities
  • CosmicJeans: A website to buy jeans
  • SpySure: Website with services to monitor what employees are doing.
  • French District: A multi-purpose French website.
  • Zawiya: Religious and culture related website
  • UK Exam: Website with an exam system for those who want to come to United Kingdom
  • Various other projects that could not go live
  • Various Facebook Apps

Javascript

  • Slidr: jQuery plugin to create beautiful HTML Presentations !
  • HTML5Sticky: Sticky Notes App for the Web !
  • StyleTable: jQuery plugin to style html tables!
  • DropShadow: jQuery plugin to apply drop shadow effect to any element!

Mobile

  • My Goals: Android app to save tasks/todos/goals !
  • Caller Details: Android app to show caller details when they call !
  • Magic Dialler: J2ME/JavaMe app !

CSS

  • Twitter Bootstrap Admin Template: Make app's backend good-looking !
  • Free Admin Template: Another admin template !
  • Pakistan's Flag: Flag of Pakistan with pure CSS

Browser

  • Webnote: Chrome browser extension + backend to help you save pages and do research !
  • Facebookify: Greasemonkey script to inject instance of Facebook object into pages !

Others

  • Pak SMS: Software made in VB6 to send free SMS to Pakistan !

Technologies: php, javascript, jquery, css/css3, html/html5, mvc, wordpress, joomla, codeigniter, laravel, opencart, backbone, angularjs, android, git, svn, agile, etc

pages.title: Contact
pages.body:
To get in touch, Twitter or Email is best (depending on the length of the message). I’m also on LinkedIn.

Hey! I am available for hire ;-)

posts.title: Welcome !
posts.body:
Hello, World !

This is my first post on this blog hosted at awesome github pages. Previously I used to blog on wordpress here but I switched to github pages because I really wanted to have static blog with free hosting and ability to write up quick posts using Markdown syntax. In the next post, I will write about BloggerCMS, a CMS I have made that helps create static blogs. This blog has also been generated via BloggerCMS :)

On this blog, I intend to write my ideas mainly about PHP as well as other related web development technologies.

Stay tuned :)
